message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $200. It's a steal at this price, if I do say so myself!

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the excitement around it, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $120. I think it's worth more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $180? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product.

Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position, but I still feel there might be room for negotiation. I am willing to pay $150 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
